page.title: 08HUNWICK PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: Our school is a Junior&Infant Mixed.It is a small village school,with 5 teachers and a Headteacher.The building is three years old having been built because the old one was set on fire in 1980.The children mostly come from Hunwick but some come Toronto,5 come from Sunnybrow and 3 from Willington.At Christmas we have parties ,a play and a Carol Concert. In Spring we sometimes have a Spring Fayre and in summer we have a Sports Day.We donate toys to Dr. Barnardo's children every year.The children in our school go to the theatre once a year and we have other educational visits,usually one a term.The eldest pupils go on an annual field trip to centres at Richmond (Yorkshire), Beamish Hall (Co.Durham), Ireshopeburn (Weardale) or Middleton-in-Teesdale.
